etymology.interpretation: This character visually represents steps or a path, often used as a radical in characters related to movement or walking.

examples.chinese: 在汉字中(在漢字中)，彳表示步伐的一部分(彳表示步伐的一部分)。
examples.pinyin: Zài hànzì zhōng, chì biǎoshì bùfá de yībùfèn.
examples.english: In Chinese characters, 彳 represents part of a step.

examples.chinese: 书法家在练字时(書法家在練字時)，也会仔细描绘彳这一偏旁(也會仔細描繪彳這一偏旁)。
examples.pinyin: Shūfǎ jiā zài liànzì shí, yě huì zǐxì miáohuì chì zhè yī piānpáng.
examples.english: When practicing calligraphy, calligraphers carefully depict the radical 彳.
